body.description: It's a new time for that time of the month. Get up to 100% leak and odor-free protection with Tampax Radiant tampons designed with a LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they even happen. For protection you can feel good about. Got leaks? Go up an absorbency. Uncomfortable to remove? Go down an absorbency. Free of dyes, perfume, latex*, BPA, and elemental chlorine bleaching. Thanks to their Textured Grip, they are specifically designed for incredibly comfortable tampon insertion. Plus, they come in a CleanSeal Wrapper created for more** ease, more clean, and more hygiene - to help dispose of them wherever you are. How to insert a tampon: Slowly insert the tampon applicator from the tip, all the way to the grip. After you've pushed the plunger in all the way, pull the applicator out. How to remove a tampon: You'll use your thumb and finger to grip the string and pull it slowly out. Please do not flush your tampon. Properly dispose of your tampon in the trash.Don't settle for less when you can get more. Discover outstanding protection for up to eight hours with Tampax, the #1 U.S. Gynecologist recommended tampon brand*** *natural rubber latex **vs. Tampax Pearl ***based on 2020 survey

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: LeakGuard Braid Tampax Radiant Tampons feature a LeakGuard Braid. Textured Grip Tampax Radiant Tampons feature a Textured Grip for easy, comfortable placement. CleanSeal Wrapper With the CleanSeal Wrapper, disposal is easy no matter where you are. Long-Lasting Protection Tampax Radiant Tampons provide up to eight hours of protection. LeakGuard Braid Textured Grip CleanSeal Wrapper Long-Lasting Protection

Tampax Radiant Tampons Tampax Pocket Radiant Tampons Always Radiant Liners Always Radiant Pads Always Radiant Overnight Pads Choose the product that's right for you Tampax Radiant Tampons provide up to 100% Leak & Odor-Free protection. Tampax Pocket Radiant Tampons provide up to 100% Leak & Odor-Free protection that fits discreetly in your pocket. Stay fresh every day of the month with Always Radiant Daily Liners for up to 100% leak-free protection. Always Radiant is made with FlexFoam for a thin and flexible pad with up to 100% leak and odor-free protection. Specially designed for nighttime use, made with FlexFoam for Zero- Feel protection.

Find your Flow Combo Your period is different every day of your flow, so why wear the same tampon absorbency? Tampax Radiant tampons come in different absorbencies, so you can move up or down as needed. A lot of women experience a heavier flow in the beginning of their period, and then it gets lighter toward the end. So you might want to think about switching between different absorbencies. If the tampon reaches full absorption before four hours, you need a higher absorbency like Super or Super Plus for extra protection. If there is still white fiber showing after four to eight hours, you need a lower absorbency. Use for a maximum of eight hours. FAQ How do I use a Tampax Radiant Tampon Applicator? Tampax Radiant tampons have a textured grip applicator for easy and comfortable insertion. With the removal string hanging down, insert the outer tube at a slight upward angle, toward the small of your back. Gently slide the applicator all the way in until your fingers touch your body. Then push the inner tube all the way into the outer tube until the ends of both tubes are even. Place the used applicator back into the wrapper and throw it away. How does Tampax Radiant stop leaks? Tampax Radiant has a LeakGuard Braid to help stop leaks before they happen. What makes Tampax Pocket Radiant different from Tampax Radiant? Tampax Pocket Radiant compact tampons offer the same protection as Tampax Radiant tampons, but are more discreet. They're a full-size tampon in a smaller extendable applicator. Find your Flow Combo FAQ

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love these! I'll admit, I felt dumb and had a bit of a problem figuring them out, but that's because they're meant to be pocket size which is really cool. So, don't feel dumb if you weren't sure what to do either. I didn't know they were even pocket size but I did notice the box was smaller. I actually prefer these over the regular size now. And the size comes with Regular and Super sizes. They easily fit in your pocket which is nice, too. I highly recommend these. And the applicator in plastic, NOT cardboard. Please view my picture for what they look like and how they operate. Thank you! Definitely 🌟 5 Stars 🌟

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: As a heavier-flow-gal, I like having a pack of the regulars and supers so I don’t have 1000 lights laying around. Easy to use, good absorbency. My go to!

reviews.reviewText: The Radiant line's quality is unmatched! Tampax Radiant Tampons have consistently exceeded my expectations, earning a solid five-star rating. Their performance is exceptional, providing reliable protection and comfort during my menstrual cycle.

reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and no string odors

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always first choice
reviews.reviewText: You don’t even feel like you are on a period when using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really good product! Bad applicator.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my daughter who is getting ready to leave for college. This should get her through to graduation in 4 years……maybe. These do a great job for intended use and prevent leakage. I am just so disappointed that, by now, not all applicators are biodegradable. If I had realized that these were not prior to purchasing, I wouldn’t have. There is no good reason to fill our landfills with more plastic. Everyone else is taking care of that for us! So, if you’re not worried about Mother Earth, this is an excellent option. Personally, I will be searching for a product just like this with a much better applicator.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I received 3 boxes of 28 regulars and not the 3 boxes of 28 mixed super and regulars. Had to wait almost a month from order to delivery just to be wrong. I'm disappointed as these were extremely high in price.
